services.name: Office Cleaning
services.description: Ensure a productive and healthy environment for your team. Our detailed office cleaning services are designed to maintain professionalism and hygiene throughout your workspace.
paragraphs: Keep your workplace clean, healthy and productive with professional office cleaning services from Jani Queen in Ottawa. Our experienced team offers a full range of workplace cleaning solutions tailored to the needs of your office.

Our office cleaning services include day porter service, personalized cleaning programs, floor stripping and waxing, carpet cleaning and move in or move out cleaning. We also provide weekend and holiday cleaning services for maximum flexibility.

No matter the size of your office, Jani Queen is equipped to maintain a spotless and hygienic environment for employees and visitors. Contact our team today to request a quote for our office cleaning and sanitization services in Ottawa.

services.name: Carpet Cleaning
services.description: Revitalize your carpets and improve indoor air quality with our specialized cleaning solutions. We target deep-seated dirt and allergens to restore the freshness and appearance of your flooring.
